EmailTemplate.name: 09-30-21 BNK Coin Email 2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: How are you handling the increase in coin transactions?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: With cash and coin in people’s pockets currently increasing again, is your branch network able to easily handle it? Coin can be costly media to handle—taking 5-6 minutes for tellers to process. With financial institutions (FIs) limiting the amount customers can deposit at any one time, it can put pressure on that all-important customer experience. Find out how FIs can change all that. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
